name: REVV Racing
description:
[REVV Racing](https://www.revvracing.com/) is the latest Play-to-Earn
competitive racing metaverse from the REVV Motorsport team. This
ecosystem is designed from the ground-up to be cross-chain, utilising
the REVV token, and providing collectable and gameplay experiences for
racing game players - competitive and casual, collectors, and fans of motorsports.
